title: Bagels and Beans
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Dutch-owned chain lunchroom offer a menu inspired not by the American bagel but by tastes of Europe and Southern France. Mostly vegetarian suitable food with several vegan choices. Uses organic and/or fair-trade ingredients. Bagels, salads, juices, coffee and tea. Could replace cream cheese with hummus. Has Wi-Fi.
